newsitem.title: USA: StaffMark Inc buys two staffing companies.
newsitem.headline: StaffMark Inc buys two staffing companies.

text.p: StaffMark Inc said on Wednesday that it had acquired privately held companies HR Alternatives and TPS/Furr & Associates, a move it expected to have a positive impact on 1997 earning per share.

The staffing company did not disclose how much it had paid for the two businesses, but said it had increased its line of credit with Mercantile Bank of St. Louis from $50 million to $100 million to ensure adequate capital for its growth plans.
StaffMark also said it anticipated accounting for the transactions as an asset purchase.
In addition, the company said the acquisitions would allow it to strengthen its position in Tennessee, North Carolina and Virginia.
HR Alternatives and TPS/Furr & Associates provide temporary staffing in clerical and light industrial jobs.
